111.content: You stare suspiciously at the strange letter that you have just recieved in the mail. In says something about competing in some kind of tournament, and to be at the docks tomorrow morning, 9:00 a.m sharp. You are to wait for a boat at dock 4. You sigh, and set down the letter just as Sarah and Cherin, your best friends and roomates, enter. "Whatcha got?" Cherin asks. You hand her the letter and her brow furrows. "What does it mean by tournament? What kind of tournament?" Sarah asks. "I don't know" you shake your head, "I think I'll go just to see what it's about." Your friends stare at you strangely but say nothing more.
111.title: The Invitation

choices: Decide to explore the boat a little
1111.content: You wake at 7:30 the next morning and sleepily walk to the mirror. After pulling your strawberry-blonde hair back into a ponytail, you grab your suitcase that you packed last night, and head out. Most of the docks are empty, except dock 4, where a large crowd has gathered in front of an old looking boat with a dragon on the front. You cringe at the sight of it. Then, after following the crowd for a while, you finally make it onto the boat. Inside it's very dim and lit only by a few torches here and there. You are led down a passage and into a small cabin where two people are already seated. A stern looking woman with blonde hair and a man with sunglasses who is reading a magazine. You find that the woman is Lt. Sonya Blade, and the man is the movie star Jonny Cage.
1111.title: The Journey Begins

11111.content:
Perhaps one of these people can tell you what this is all about, you think to yourself. Gazing intently at the movie star and the blonde lieutenant, you wonder which one you should approach to ask a few questions about this ship and the strange invitation you received.

Making up your mind, you go and take a seat next to . . .
11111.title: Whom Should I Talk To?

choices: "Maybe you need some REAL glasses, hot shot!"
111111.content:
By now the movie star, Johnny Cage, has noticed you staring at him. He's probably used to being stared at by females, you laugh to yourself. He is a real hottie! You'd love to meet him anyway, so you decide to go over and ask him about this strange situation you're in.

"Hi, I'm Ashlynn," you introduce yourself, as you approach Cage. "I was wondering if you could tell me where this ship is going?"

Cage eyes you suspiciously and doesn't appear too willing to give you an answer, so you continue, "I also got this strange invitation . . . " You produce the invitation and immediately Cage seems to relax. Flashing a big smile that displays a set of brilliant white teeth, he answers you, "Sure, honey, you've been invited to participate in Mortal Kombat!"

"Mortal Kombat?" you exclaim, "what in the world . . . "

"You mean you came on this ship and didn't even know what this was about?" Johnny asks incredulously. Then he gives you a once-over with his sunglasses-covered eyes. "You don't look much like a fighter," he comments doubtfully. "Are you sure you weren't invited by mistake?"

You feel your temper begin to flare up. What is your answer?
111111.title: Conversing With Cage

1111111.content:
"You wanna try me movie boy!?" You say, dumping your suitcase and postioning yourself in a typical fighting position, you can't believe the nerve of this guy!

"Woah," Johnny said, holding up his hands. "I'm not going to waste my energy on you, I'm gonna need it in the tournament." YOu set a determinded look on your face, this guy was gonna get his arse whipped! Suddenly Sonya was between the two, facing you.

"Johnny isn't being rude uh, what was your name?"

"Ashlynn."

"Right Ashlynn, but Johnny is right, you'll need all your strength if you want to survive."

"Survive? Look, this is all a little too weird, I'm getting off this boat,"

"Its a bit late for that now, " Johnny said standing up, "We've already left."
1111111.title: Fight him

11111112.content:
"What? But I..." you start to stutter. Johnny Cage smiles at you, "Might as well sit back and enjoy the ride."
Reluctanlty, you pick up your suit case and plop down next to the movie star, who ignores you and continues reading his magazine. You notice that his picture is on the cover.
"He's conceited," you think to yourself, "Like most good looking men."
Sonya finally turns her eyes to you.
"You really don't know where we're going?" she asks. You shake your head, avoiding her intimidating stare.
"All I know is that it's some kind of a fighting tournament," you say, pretending to be occupied with your nails.
Sonya lets out a short laugh.
"Not just any fighting tournament," she says, "The Mortal Kombat tournament."
You stare blankly at her, the phrase Mortal Kombat means nothing to you.
"Why don't you just tell her the whole thing already?" Johnny says, shaking his head at Sonya. The Lt. sighs.
"Fine," she says, looking at you again, "You've been invited to a special tournament. A tournament used for the purpose of defending Earth."
You riase an eyebrow, but she continues.
"This tournament has been used to protect Earth for thousands of years, but this time the circumstances are a little different."
"How?" you ask. She glares at you for interrupting her, and you go silent.
"This time the tournament is not only being held by it's usual host, Shang Tsung, but also by another sorcerer, Quan Chi."
You can't help yourself, you have to chuckle.
"Sorcerer? This is a joke right?" You laugh.
Sonya shskes her head seriously.
"No," she continues, "They have uncovered some kind of army, Raiden wasn't spacific about the details. All we know is that they're planning to use this tournament to collect souls to add to the army."
You are staring wide eyed at her, but still fighting the urge to laugh.
"All right, all right," you say, "But if this is some kind of stupid reality show I better get paid."
Sonya snorts and looks away again.
"Nope," Johnny says, "I don't do reality shows. They're below my standards."
You still have many more questions, but decide not to annoy them further. You could sit here in uncomfortable silence with these two, or you could check out the rest of the ship. What will you do?
11111112.title: So Many Questions

choices: Head back to the safety of your cabin
Take a tour of Shang Tsung's ship
111111122.content:
You look at Johnny Cage, who is still enthralled in his magazine.
"I'm going to go check out the rest of this boat." you say.
Johnny gives you an indifferent grunt, but doesn't favor you with a glance. You leave your suitcase on the floor and leave the cabin. Outside the hallways are silent, but you can faintly make out the sounds of fighters talking inside the other cabins.
"Maybe this wasn't such a good idea," you think to yourself, then change your mind, "Stop being such a baby."
You shkae your head and walk down one of the hallways, then another, and another. Soon you have gone through so many hallways that you can't remember where you came from. You take a right turn, and gasp in surprise when you run into something solid. You look up to see a robed man a head taller than yourself. He backs up, taking on an angry stance.
"I'm...I'm sorry I didn't mean to..." you start to say.
"Do not apologize," he cuts you off, "Stay out of my way in the future."
Something about his voice sends a chill down your spine. You grunt when he shoves you into the wall and walks past. Without looking again, you rush around the corner to find yourself in yet another hallway.
"How big is this ship?" You ask to no one at all.
"Not big at all, you have been down this hall three times."
You jump, startled, and turn to see who had spoken. It is a man in a long black leather coat. He has raven hair that falls to his shoulders, and slanted black eyes that are glittering strangely at you.
"I have?" you ask.
He nods, "I have been watching you," he laughs, "It was amusing. But anyway, if you need help getting back to your cabin, I would be more than happy to assist you. Or I could give you a tour of my ship."
Your mouth falls open.
"Your ship? You're Shang Tsung?"
He nods slightly, "None other. Now, what will it be?"
111111122.title: An Encounter With the Shipmaster

1111111222.content:
You decide to chance it.
"I guess a tour wouldn't hurt." you tell Shang Tsung.
He smiles, "Very well, right this way."
He proceeds to lead you around the ship, showing you various rooms which you really have no interest in. You had actually agreed to take the tour because you want to find out more about the tournament.
"So," you say, following close behind him, "Where exactly is this island?"
"My island is located in the Lost Sea," he replies simply.
You have never heard of the Lost Sea, but don't care enough to ask about it.
"Can you explain to me about this tournament?" you ask him hopefully.
He doesn't look at you.
"I will explain to all of my invited guests once we have arrived on the island."
He stops in front of a door.
"I believe this is you cabin." he says, gesturing to the door.
You nod, realizing that he's right.
"Thank you."
You open the door to find Johnny asleep with his magazine in his lap, Sonya playing with a pocket knife, and another woman. She has bronze skin and dark eyes. Her hair is dark like her eyes and is tied behind her head in a messy bun. She is sitting near Sonya, her arms folded into a sky blue MUDD sweatshirt. She looks up as you enter, so does Sonya.
"What took you so long, did you fall off the boat or something?" Sonya asks. It's the first time you have seen her smile.
"No," you reply, "I got a little lost, and then I ran into Shang Tsung."
The dark skinned woman's eyes widen.
"You ran into Shang Tsung and your survived?"
You nod.
"Funny," she says, "I ran into Quan Chi on the top deck."
"Well anyway," Sonya says, "Maybe we should get some sleep. We'll be needing our energy."
You nod and sit down next to the other woman.
"I'm Amilee," she tells you.
"Ashlynn," you reply.
You find that the more you talk to Amilee, the more you like her. You start to feel better now that you've found someone who has a lot in common with you.
1111111222.title: A New Friend

11111112221.content:
It seems you have only been asleep for a few minutes when Amilee and waking you up.
"Come on," she says, "We're here."
You stretch your arms above your head and grab your suitcase, heading out the door along with the others. Outside, you step onto the sandy shore and gaze up at a towering castle that seems to stretch into the sky itself. No one sle is talking, so you follow them toward the castle.
A while later you have all put your things away in your rooms, and are sitting in the dining hall, talking quietly. Amilee is busy chatting with Johnny Cage, and Sonya is talking to some other fighter at the table. Feeling a little left out, you look around the room, inspecting the other fighters. You gulp, most of them are bigger and taller than you. Looking around more you find Shang Tsung standing near the doorway, along with another man. Immediately you realize that the other man must be Quan Chi. You look back at your companions, they are still engaged in their conversations. You could stay at the table and continue to feel left out, or you could walk around the dining room a bit.
11111112221.title: Arrival at the Island

You decide to walk around the dinnign area.
Yoy look over to these long steps with a red carpet and a larg door at the top to see Shang Tsung standin there "Ladies and Gentlmen welcome to mortal kombat My name as you all may know is Shang Tsung and I will ask all of you to watch a demonstration in a moment to sho you what youare up against"he then pointed to a ninja in blue and a man with no shirt they bowed to each other and then yelled the shirtless man came flying in the air with a round house kick and the blue man seemed to just stand there but you notice a blue ray come out of his hand and it hits the shirtless guy and he falls frozen solid to the ground.Shang Tsung gave a large smirk and said "enjoy these few moments before the tormenent for they may be your last" then he left.Jhonny seemed scared and then he said "sure be good for the career he says yeah right".

"Listen to me," Sonya was saying "Kitana told me The Emperor is planning to destroy a human who does not know their potential."

Johnny nodded."If this is true then the only way to find out is by wait for the first attack to show the person's identity."

Ashlynn looked around the ship, these were no ordinary people, some were holding fireballs, other practiced their martial arts while some floated in mid-air!

Okay,thought Ashlynn, either i'm dreaming or i'm in The Twilight Zone.

You think about Lui Kang, the one you once loved, the man who had been the champion of Mortal Kombat until his death just seven days earlier. No one has witnessed his murder, but Raiden had said he was sure it was the work of the sorcerers. "I wish you were here Lui." you say outloud to no one but yourself. "I know I'm expected to help fight off this alliance, but I don't know if I can do it without you." Sadly you leave your place in the grass and head back to the palace where Raiden is waiting along with Sub-Zero.

12122.title: take that reptile!

122.content:
You are wandering around the inner hallways of Shang Tsung's ramshackle ship. You could have gone back to your fortress in Outworld until the start of the tournament, but you decide it's wiser to travel to the island on the boat. You'll get a chance to examine the fighters that your partner has invited, the people who will be your competition. You laugh to yourself. As if a group of pathetic mortals from Earthrealm could possibly pose any threat to a renowned sorcerer such as yourself. You make your way around a corner, pulling the hood of your midnight robe over your face. Just as you round the corner you find yourself running into a figure much smaller than you. You back up with an angry grunt, and glare through the darkness at the person who had stumbled into your path. It is a young girl of maybe twenty or so years, with fiery red hair and a panicked expression covering her pale face.
"I'm...I'm sorry I didn't mean to..."
You know that she can't make out your hooded face in the dim light. You take a breath, trying to control your temper.
"Do not apologize," you say sharply. The girl jumps at the sound of your baritone voice. You smile inwardly, enjoying the fear you have caused her.
"Stay out of my way in the future," You tell her.
You shove her to one side, not giving her another glance, and continue your walk down the hall. Once you reach another turn, you look back, but she is gone. Your smile broadens, she had probably fled in terror. Now you are wondering where you should go next. You could head back to the upper deck, or you could pay some of the fighters a visit, just to inform them of who you are and the fact that they will undoubtably be killed in the tournament.
122.title: A Renowned Sorcerer

1221.content:
You decide to postpone tormenting the fighters and head back up deck. You walk down a few more halls and then climb the stairs to the top. You walk to the front of the ship, staring out at the water, only to find someone else there. Another young woman, about the same age as the last one, is leaning over the railing, gazing at the water. She has bronze skin and huge dark eyes. Her hair is dark like her eyes, and is tied behind her head in a small knot. She sighs, not noticing you. You clear your throat, irritated that you can find no privacy in this place. She spins around quickly and looks at you. Her face takes on a look of shock, just as the other girl's had.
"Am I in your way or something?" she asks.
You frown, it seems she has a bit of an attitude.
"Yes," you reply, "You are."
She stares defiantly at you.
"I'm sorry but I was here first and it is a big boat," she says.
You take an angry breath, remembering that she can't see you. You yank down your hood, tired of her attitude. Her brown eyes widen slightly.
"You have no idea who you are talking to," you inform her, "My name is Quan Chi, and I am hosting this tournament."
She is at a loss for words for a moment, but she recovers quickly.
"I'm sorry, I didn't know..." she says quietly.
You chuckle.
"What is your name?"
She seems hesitant, "Amilee."
"Well Amilee, I hope you enjoy your time on the island, for these few days will be your last."
You laugh at her as she walks away and heads back into the boat.
"This tournament may turn out to be too easy..."
1221.title: Another Mortal Encounter

123.content: You stand above the fallen body of the former chosen one, Lui Kang, and smile as you transfer his soul from his body to one of the grotesque soldiers in the Dragon King's army. With the help of Quan Chi, you managed to transport the thousands of mummified soldiers to a huge chamber in your palace. As Lui Kang's soul reaches the soldier its eyes flash green, you know that your worst enemy is now trapped forever in a body that he cannot control. Quan Chi is standing not far from you, his eyes moving slowly from soldier to soldier. "We still need thousands more." he says. You nod, but you know it will not be hard to obtain enough mortal souls to revive the whole army. Since the deal between you and Quan Chi was made, you have not trusted him. You have taught yourself never to trust anyone completely. You agreed to use your power of soul transplantation to revive the army, and in exchange Quan Chi used his stolen amulet to unlock a portal to the Heavens, giving you an unlimited supply of souls. But he could just as easily close the portal. You shake these thoughts from your mind as you walk away, preparing to return to Earth in search of more souls.
123.title: Revenge

But Raiden insisted that you, along with Sonya, should board the boat and find out any information about Shang Tsung's plans. So now you're stuck here, reading an article about your latest movie, when a young red haired woman walks in. She looks confused. "Um," she says, "Can I sit here?" You gesture for her to sit. "Do know anything about this tournament?" she asks. Poor girl, you think, she has no idea what she's getting herself into. Before you can say anything Sonya tells the girl that it's a fighting tournament, but fails to mention the powerful sorcerers that are bent on taking over the world. You stare at the girl, she has a look of innocence that you have never seen in a Mortal Kombat fighter. Suddenly she turns her head to look at you, "I know you," she says, "You're Jonny Cage." "Uh, yeah." you reply. "I'm a really big fan." she says, and Sonya shakes her head.
124.title: You Meet a Fan
